name: The Legend of Zelda Main Theme Medley
synopsis: See 3D footage of The Legend of Zelda Main Theme Medley* performed by a full orchestra. This and other songs were included on a CD packed with the Legend of Zelda™: Skyward Sword game for the Wii™ console, released in Dec. 2011. *This video was also available via the Nintendo Video application in 2011.
